title: PrIncipal quiver Grassmannians: conjectures
summary: Let $P$ and $I$ be a projective and an injective representations of a Dynkin quiver. We consider quiver Grassmannians of subrepresentations of dimension $\dim P$ inside representations of dimension $\dim P + \dim I$. Based on extensive computer experiments, we formulate several conjectures about the algebro-geometric properties of these quiver Grassmannians.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Dynkin箭图的射影表示P和单射表示I，考察了维数为dim P+dim I的表示中维数为dim P的子表示构成的箭图格拉斯曼流形，基于大量计算机实验提出了关于这些流形代数几何性质的若干猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究Dynkin箭图的表示理论中特定类型的箭图格拉斯曼流形的代数几何性质，这些流形在表示论和代数几何的交汇处具有理论意义。
AI.method: 基于大量计算机实验，对Dynkin箭图的射影表示P和单射表示I，研究维数为dim P+dim I的表示中维数为dim P的子表示构成的箭图格拉斯曼流形。
AI.result: 通过计算机实验发现了这些箭图格拉斯曼流形的代数几何性质模式，并基于此提出了若干猜想。
AI.conclusion: 论文提出了关于Dynkin箭图中特定箭图格拉斯曼流形代数几何性质的猜想，为进一步的理论研究提供了实验基础和方向。

title: Minuscule Coxeter Dressians
comment: extended abstract of 9 pages, 1 figure, comments welcome!
summary: In this extended abstract, we study special tropical prevarieties which we call Coxeter Dressians. They arise from equations capturing a generalization of valuated symmetric basis exchange for Coxeter matroids. In particular, we study subdivisions of the associated Coxeter matroid polytopes. We show that the subdivisions induced by points of the Coxeter Dressian consist of cells which are strong Coxeter matroidal. This generalizes well-known results in type $A$ to other Lie types. Finally, we implement explicit computations of Coxeter Dressians in OSCAR.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了一类特殊的tropical预簇——Coxeter Dressians，它源于Coxeter拟阵的赋值对称基交换推广方程，并研究了相关Coxeter拟阵多面体的细分结构。
AI.motivation: 将类型A中已知的Dressian和拟阵多面体细分理论推广到其他Lie类型，研究Coxeter拟阵的tropical几何性质。
AI.method: 通过Coxeter拟阵的赋值对称基交换方程定义Coxeter Dressians，研究其诱导的Coxeter拟阵多面体细分，证明这些细分单元具有强Coxeter拟阵性质。
AI.result: 证明了Coxeter Dressian中的点诱导的细分单元是强Coxeter拟阵的，将类型A的已知结果推广到其他Lie类型，并在OSCAR中实现了Coxeter Dressians的显式计算。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了Coxeter Dressians理论框架，将tropical几何与Coxeter拟阵理论相结合，为研究其他Lie类型的组合几何结构提供了新工具。

title: A recollement approach to Brieskorn-Pham singularities
summary:
In this paper, we construct recollements and ladders for Brieskorn-Pham singularities via reduction/insertion functors, and study the singularity categories of the Brieskorn-Pham singularities using these ladders.
  In particular, we construct a class of tilting objects, called the extended tilting $n$-cuboids, whose endomorphism algebras are $n$-fold tensor products of certain Nakayama algebras. Moreover, we show that such an endomorphism algebra is derived equivalent to a certain replicated algebra. This generalizes the Happel-Seidel symmetry to the context of Brieskorn-Pham singularities.

AI.tldr: 通过约化/插入函子为Brieskorn-Pham奇点构建recollements和ladders，并利用这些ladders研究奇点范畴。构造了扩展倾斜n-立方体这类倾斜对象，其自同态代数是特定Nakayama代数的n重张量积，且该代数与特定复制代数导出等价，将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到Brieskorn-Pham奇点。
AI.motivation: 研究Brieskorn-Pham奇点的奇点范畴结构，通过构建recollements和ladders来更好地理解这些奇点的代数几何性质，并将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到更广泛的奇点类型。
AI.method: 使用约化/插入函子构造recollements和ladders；构建扩展倾斜n-立方体这类倾斜对象；分析其自同态代数结构，证明其为特定Nakayama代数的n重张量积；建立该代数与特定复制代数之间的导出等价关系。
AI.result: 成功为Brieskorn-Pham奇点构建了recollements和ladders；构造了扩展倾斜n-立方体，其自同态代数是Nakayama代数的n重张量积；证明了该自同态代数与特定复制代数导出等价，从而将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到Brieskorn-Pham奇点。
AI.conclusion: 通过构建recollements、ladders和扩展倾斜n-立方体，深入研究了Brieskorn-Pham奇点的奇点范畴结构，建立了其自同态代数与复制代数之间的导出等价关系，成功将Happel-Seidel对称性推广到这类奇点，为奇点理论提供了新的代数工具和视角。

title: Classification of real and imaginary modules of quantum affine algebras in monoidal categorifications of affine cluster algebras
summary: Recently, Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park introduced a wide family of monoidal categories of finite-dimensional representations of quantum affine algebras, which provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras. In this paper, we prove that, for types $ADE$, some of these categories provide monoidal categorifications of cluster algebras of affine type. Moreover, by means of the combinatorial theory of affine type cluster algebras, we give a complete classification of real and imaginary simple modules in these categories. In particular, we show that, in these cases, the conjecture asserting that real simple modules correspond exactly to cluster monomials holds.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明对于ADE型量子仿射代数，某些有限维表示范畴提供了仿射型簇代数的幺半范畴化，并完全分类了这些范畴中的实和虚单模。
AI.motivation: Kashiwara-Kim-Oh-Park最近引入了一类量子仿射代数有限维表示的幺半范畴，这些范畴提供了簇代数的幺半范畴化。本文旨在研究这些范畴在ADE型情况下的具体性质，特别是它们与仿射型簇代数的关系。
AI.method: 利用仿射型簇代数的组合理论，对相关范畴中的实和虚单模进行完全分类。通过理论分析和证明，建立这些范畴与仿射型簇代数之间的对应关系。
AI.result: 证明了对于ADE型，这些范畴确实提供了仿射型簇代数的幺半范畴化。完全分类了这些范畴中的实和虚单模，并证实了实单模恰好对应于簇单项式的猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为量子仿射代数表示论与簇代数理论建立了重要联系，验证了实单模与簇单项式对应的猜想，为相关数学领域提供了新的理论工具和分类结果。

title: Preprojective categories of type A
summary: We introduce a continuous version of preprojective algebras of type $A$. In particular, we are interested in the preprojective category over an open, bounded subinterval $\mathbb{I}$ of $\mathbb{R}$, denoted $Λ_{\mathbb{I}}$. We study the representable projective modules and define a useful type of sub- and quotient module called decorous modules. These are completely described by a function from the closure $\overline{\mathbb{I}}$ of $\mathbb{I}$ to $\mathbb{R}$ whose 'slopes' are not too steep anywhere. We later use these to describe permuton ideals, a generalization of the support $τ$-tilting ideals of preprojective algebras of type $A_n$, which we call permutation ideals. Once we have our generalization, we show that permutation ideals can be recovered from permuton ideals. Moreover, permutation ideals are $τ$-rigid and we show an analogous property for our permuton ideals. Along the way, we classify all the brick $Λ_{\mathbb{I}}$-modules.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了A型预投射代数的连续版本，研究了开有界子区间上的预投射范畴，定义了得体的子模和商模，并推广了置换理想的概念。
AI.motivation: 研究A型预投射代数的连续版本，将离散的预投射代数推广到连续情形，探索在连续区间上的代数结构及其表示理论。
AI.method: 引入开有界子区间上的预投射范畴Λ_𝕀，研究可表示投射模，定义得体模（由闭区间到ℝ的函数描述），推广置换理想为permuton理想，并分类所有砖模。
AI.result: 完全描述了得体模的特征（由斜率不过陡的函数决定），证明了置换理想可以从permuton理想恢复，permuton理想具有τ-刚性类似性质，并分类了所有砖Λ_𝕀-模。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了A型预投射代数的连续版本理论框架，推广了置换理想概念，建立了离散与连续情形之间的联系，为连续代数表示理论提供了新工具。

title: Reductive monoids and cluster algebras
summary: We show that the coordinate ring of the Vinberg monoid of a simply connected semisimple complex group is an upper cluster algebra. As an application, we construct cluster structures on a large class of flat reductive monoids. After localization, we obtain cluster structures on any connected reductive group whose commutator group is simply connected.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了Vinberg幺半群的坐标环是上簇代数，并由此在广泛的平坦约化幺半群上构造了簇结构。
AI.motivation: 研究Vinberg幺半群的代数结构，探索其在簇代数理论中的性质，为约化群和幺半群提供新的簇结构构造方法。
AI.method: 首先证明Vinberg幺半群的坐标环是上簇代数，然后利用这一结果在平坦约化幺半群上构造簇结构，最后通过局部化将结果推广到连通约化群。
AI.result: 成功证明了Vinberg幺半群的坐标环是上簇代数，并在此基础上构造了平坦约化幺半群的簇结构，通过局部化得到了连通约化群的簇结构。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Vinberg幺半群与簇代数理论的重要联系，为约化群和幺半群的代数几何研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Weyl-Type and Witt-Type Algebras with Exponential Generators:Structure, Automorphisms, and Representation Theory
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies a new class of non-commutative algebras -- Weyl-type and Witt-type algebras -- generated by differential operators with exponential and generalized power function coefficients. We define the expolynomial ring $R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = \mathbb{F}\bigl[ e^{\pm x^{p} e^{t}},\; e^{\mathcal{A} x},\; x^{\mathcal{A}} \bigr]$ associated to an additive subgroup $\mathcal{A} \subset \mathbb{F}$, and investigate its Ore extension $A_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}[\partial; δ]$ (Weyl-type) and its derivation algebra $\mathfrak{g}_{p,t,\mathcal{A}} = \operatorname{Der}_{\mathbb{F}}(R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}})$ (Witt-type). Our main results establish: (1) the automorphism group of $R_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}$ is isomorphic to $(\mathbb{F}^{\times})^{2r+1} \rtimes \operatorname{GL}(2r+1,\mathbb{Z})$; (2) a Galois descent theorem showing that fixed-point subalgebras under finite Galois actions recover the original Weyl-type algebra; (3) the non-existence of finite-dimensional simple modules for $A_{p,t,\mathcal{A}}$; (4) the Zariski density of isomorphism classes in moduli spaces as transcendental parameters vary; (5) the stability of simplicity under generic quantum deformation; and (6) a complete representation-theoretic framework including the classification of irreducible weight modules, the construction of Harish--Chandra modules with BGG-type resolutions, and the structure of category $\mathcal{O}$. These results unify and extend classical theories of Weyl algebras, Witt algebras, and generalized Weyl algebras, while opening new directions in deformation theory, non-commutative geometry, and the representation theory of infinite-dimensional algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统研究了一类新的非交换代数——Weyl型和Witt型代数，这些代数由具有指数和广义幂函数系数的微分算子生成。论文定义了expolynomial环及其Ore扩张和导子代数，并建立了六个主要结果，包括自同构群结构、Galois下降定理、有限维简单模不存在性等。
AI.motivation: 统一和扩展经典Weyl代数、Witt代数和广义Weyl代数的理论，为无限维代数的表示理论、非交换几何和形变理论开辟新方向。
AI.method: 定义expolynomial环R_{p,t,𝒜} = 𝔽[e^{±x^p e^t}, e^{𝒜x}, x^{𝒜}]及其Ore扩张A_{p,t,𝒜} = R_{p,t,𝒜}[∂; δ]（Weyl型）和导子代数𝔤_{p,t,𝒜} = Der_𝔽(R_{p,t,𝒜})（Witt型），然后系统研究这些代数的结构、表示和性质。
AI.result: 1. R_{p,t,𝒜}的自同构群同构于(𝔽^×)^{2r+1} ⋊ GL(2r+1,ℤ)；2. Galois下降定理：有限Galois作用下的不动点子代数恢复原始Weyl型代数；3. A_{p,t,𝒜}不存在有限维简单模；4. 超越参数变化时同构类在模空间中的Zariski稠密性；5. 一般量子形变下简单性的稳定性；6. 完整的表示论框架。
AI.conclusion: 该研究统一并扩展了经典代数理论，为无限维代数的表示理论、非交换几何和形变理论提供了新的研究方向和工具，建立了完整的数学框架。

title: Boundedness criteria for real quivers of rank 3
comment: 19 pages, 5 figures, SageMath code in appendix. In 2nd version, Section 3 is added with an alternative new proof of the main result using Felikson-Tumarkin's geometric realizations of rank 3 quiver mutations
summary: We study the boundedness of a mutation class for quivers with real weights. The main result is a characterization of bounded mutation classes for real quivers of rank 3.

AI.tldr: 研究了带实权重的箭图突变类的有界性，主要结果是给出了秩为3的实箭图有界突变类的特征刻画。
AI.motivation: 研究带实权重的箭图突变类的有界性，这是对传统整数权重箭图突变理论的推广，探索在更一般权重条件下的突变行为。
AI.method: 采用突变理论方法，研究带实权重的箭图，特别关注秩为3的情况，通过分析突变变换的性质来刻画有界突变类。
AI.result: 获得了秩为3的实箭图有界突变类的完整特征刻画，给出了判断突变类是否有界的判别条件。
AI.conclusion: 成功刻画了秩为3的实箭图有界突变类，为理解更一般权重条件下的箭图突变行为提供了理论基础。

title: Paper BOAT
summary: We derive a formula for computing the size of lower Bruhat intervals for elements in the dominant cone of an affine Weyl group of type $A$. This enumeration problem is reduced to counting lattice points in certain polyhedra. Our main tool is a decomposition -- or tiling -- of each interval into smaller, combinatorially tractable pieces, which we call paper boats. We also conjecture a generalization of this formula to all affine Weyl groups, restricted to elements in the lowest two-sided Kazhdan-Lusztig cell, which contains almost all of the elements.

AI.tldr: 本文推导了A型仿射Weyl群中主导锥内元素的下Bruhat区间大小的计算公式，通过将区间分解为"纸船"状的可处理片段，将枚举问题转化为多面体中的格点计数问题。
AI.motivation: 研究仿射Weyl群中Bruhat区间的组合结构，特别是主导锥内元素的区间大小计算问题，这对于理解Kazhdan-Lusztig理论和表示论中的组合结构具有重要意义。
AI.method: 将每个Bruhat区间分解为称为"纸船"的更小、组合上可处理的片段，利用这种分解将枚举问题转化为计算特定多面体中的格点数量。
AI.result: 得到了A型仿射Weyl群主导锥内元素下Bruhat区间大小的具体计算公式，并提出了对所有仿射Weyl群在最低双边Kazhdan-Lusztig胞中元素的推广猜想。
AI.conclusion: 通过创新的"纸船"分解方法，成功解决了A型仿射Weyl群主导锥内元素的Bruhat区间计数问题，为更一般的仿射Weyl群情形提供了研究框架和猜想。

title: Generic bases of skew-symmetrizable affine type cluster algebras
comment: 23 pages. v2: corrected the proof of Lemma 6.10; added Example 6.16
summary: Geiss, Leclerc and Schröer introduced a class of 1-Iwanaga-Gorenstein algebras $H$ associated to symmetrizable Cartan matrices with acyclic orientations, generalizing the path algebras of acyclic quivers. They also proved that indecomposable rigid $H$-modules of finite projective dimension are in bijection with non-initial cluster variables of the corresponding Fomin-Zelevinsky cluster algebra. In this article, we prove in all affine types that their conjectural Caldero-Chapoton type formula on these modules coincide with the Laurent expression of cluster variables. By taking generic Caldero-Chapoton functions on varieties of modules of finite projective dimension, we obtain bases for affine type cluster algebras with full-rank coefficients containing all cluster monomials.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在仿射类型中，Geiss-Leclerc-Schröer提出的Caldero-Chapoton型公式与簇变量的Laurent表达式一致，并由此构造了包含所有簇单项式的仿射型簇代数基。
AI.motivation: Geiss、Leclerc和Schröer引入了一类与可对称化Cartan矩阵相关的1-Iwanaga-Gorenstein代数H，并证明了有限投射维数的不可分解刚性H模与相应Fomin-Zelevinsky簇代数的非初始簇变量之间存在双射。本文旨在验证他们提出的Caldero-Chapoton型公式在仿射类型中的正确性。
AI.method: 通过证明在仿射类型中，Caldero-Chapoton型公式与簇变量的Laurent表达式一致。然后利用有限投射维数模簇上的泛Caldero-Chapoton函数，构造仿射型簇代数的基。
AI.result: 成功证明了在仿射类型中，Caldero-Chapoton型公式确实与簇变量的Laurent表达式一致。由此构造的基包含所有簇单项式，且具有满秩系数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究验证了Geiss-Leclerc-Schröer猜想在仿射类型中的正确性，并为仿射型簇代数提供了包含所有簇单项式的基构造方法，深化了代数表示论与簇代数理论之间的联系。

title: Filtrations on quantum cohomology via Morse-Bott-Floer Spectral Sequences
comment: 87 pages, 28 figures, minor corrections, shortened some parts
summary: Using Morse-Bott-Floer spectral sequences, we describe a filtration by ideals on quantum cohomology for symplectic manifolds with a Hamiltonian $S^1$-action that extends to a pseudoholomorphic $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. These spaces include all Conical Symplectic Resolutions, in particular all Quiver Varieties. Our spectral sequences give explicit descriptions of birth-death phenomena of the barcode of the persistence module associated to the $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. This paper contains the foundational work to rigorously construct a filtration on Floer complexes from the $\mathbb{C}^*$-action, announced in our earlier paper. A substantial appendix on Morse-Bott-Floer theory deals with several of the technical difficulties of the paper. We compute a plethora of explicit examples, each highlighting various features, for Springer resolutions, ADE resolutions, and several Slodowy varieties of type A. We also consider certain Higgs moduli spaces, for which we compare our filtration with the famous P=W filtration.

AI.tldr: 该论文利用Morse-Bott-Floer谱序列，为具有哈密顿S^1作用且可扩展为伪全纯C^*作用的辛流形，在量子上同调上描述了一个理想滤过结构。这些空间包括所有锥形辛分解，特别是所有箭图簇。
AI.motivation: 研究具有哈密顿S^1作用和伪全纯C^*作用的辛流形的量子上同调结构，特别是为锥形辛分解（包括箭图簇）建立严格的滤过理论框架。
AI.method: 使用Morse-Bott-Floer谱序列方法，从C^*作用在Floer复形上构造滤过结构。论文包含一个关于Morse-Bott-Floer理论的附录，处理了多个技术难点。
AI.result: 成功构造了量子上同调上的理想滤过，并给出了与C^*作用相关的持久模条形码的生死现象的显式描述。计算了多个具体例子，包括Springer分解、ADE分解、A型Slodowy簇，以及某些Higgs模空间。
AI.conclusion: 该论文为具有C^*作用的辛流形建立了完整的滤过理论框架，将早期论文中宣布的构造严格化，并通过大量例子验证了理论的有效性，同时与著名的P=W滤过进行了比较。

title: Filtrations on quantum cohomology from the Floer theory of $\mathbb{C}^*$-actions
comment: 68 pages, 4 figures. Minor corrections, shortened some parts
summary: We construct a filtration by ideals on quantum cohomology for symplectic manifolds with a Hamiltonian $S^1$-action that extends to a pseudoholomorphic $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. These spaces include all Conical Symplectic Resolutions, in particular all Quiver Varieties. In particular, we obtain a family of filtrations on singular cohomology for any Conical Symplectic Resolution, that is sensitive to the choice of $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. The symplectic form is rarely exact at infinity for these spaces, so substantial foundational work is carried out to rigorously define Floer theory, in particular symplectic cohomology. Using Floer theory, we construct a periodic persistence module, giving rise to a graded periodic barcode associated to the $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. This encodes birth-death phenomena of Floer invariants. Our filtrations can be viewed as a Floer-theoretic analogue of Atiyah-Bott filtrations, arising from stratifying a manifold by gradient flowlines of a Morse-Bott function, but they are distinct from those and they can detect non-topological properties of the quantum product.

AI.tldr: 该论文为具有哈密顿S^1作用并扩展到伪全纯ℂ*作用的辛流形构建了量子上同调的理想滤过，特别适用于锥形辛分解（包括所有箭图簇），并利用Floer理论构造了周期持久模和分级周期条形码。
AI.motivation: 研究具有哈密顿S^1作用并扩展到伪全纯ℂ*作用的辛流形的量子上同调结构，特别是锥形辛分解这类空间。由于这些空间的辛形式在无穷远处很少是恰当的，需要建立严格的Floer理论基础。
AI.method: 1. 为具有哈密顿S^1作用并扩展到伪全纯ℂ*作用的辛流形构造量子上同调的理想滤过；2. 对锥形辛分解建立严格的Floer理论框架，包括辛上同调的定义；3. 利用Floer理论构造周期持久模和相应的分级周期条形码；4. 分析这些滤过与Atiyah-Bott滤过的关系。
AI.result: 1. 获得了锥形辛分解奇异上同调的滤过族，这些滤过对ℂ*作用的选择敏感；2. 建立了适用于这类空间的Floer理论基础；3. 构造了周期持久模和分级周期条形码，编码了Floer不变量在ℂ*作用下的生灭现象；4. 这些滤过不同于Atiyah-Bott滤过，能够检测量子积的非拓扑性质。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为具有特殊对称性的辛流形构建了新的量子上同调滤过结构，建立了相应的Floer理论框架，并展示了这些滤过在检测量子积的非拓扑性质方面的独特能力，为理解锥形辛分解等空间的几何和拓扑结构提供了新工具。
